vsParam:
Uh, Sterk and Ru Sensei?
What's wrong?

Oh, it's you. We just got a report from Ateria,
and they've found the dragon's location.

Oh, they've found the dragon's location now!?
It came from Ateria, so it means the dragon is...

Yes. This dragon is a tough one. To be on the safe side, we'd better do
a thorough investigation first, however much we want to kill it now.

So I'm here to ask for Sterk's help... We're severely
understaffed at this moment for investigation.

But unfortunately, I can't go there now myself.
Also, I can't let him go there alone...
Oh, right... After all, Sterk isn't familiar with our world yet.

Got it!
Let's take Sterk to Ateria!

Yeah, that's a great help.
Thank you.

Hold on, I'm going too!
I'm not sure if you guys could deal with it smoothly.

Yeah... At least, you guys are powerful enough to defeat
all the monsters here.

And I was told even though you're still students,
you've been through lots of battles up to now.

W-we're really flattered, Sterk!
And I'll keep trying!!

Heehee, how about that?!
Sterk has vouched for our ability!

Hmm... You... Shame on you.
I can't believe you used Sterk!
But I'm more powerful than you!

Huh~
I think [px] is so much more powerful than you, Mimi!

Alright, you're both confident, which is good.
But don't brag...

It's meaningless to argue over that.
Above all, we need to investigate the dragon.

Oh... Sorry, Ru Sensei.
So, which part of Ateria should we go to exactly?

The Dardala Company is monitoring
the dragon's movement. You can go to them first.

The Dardala Company... You mean Scalcap, right?!
OK, let's go to Scalcap's mansion now!

Oh, wait! I'm going with you.
You'll see how much more powerful I am than you!

Hehe, Mimi, you're so competitive.
But we will not lose to you â™ª

Our goal is to investigate.
Do you get me?

Haha...
Sorry to have worried you...
